Name: Nimble Charm
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Chimchar, Monferno, and Infernape.  Swap a Chim-Hair and a Chim-Fang for a Nimble Charm at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
